dmca.title: [ABUSE] Electronic Notice of Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2005 9:33 AM
To: Shelley.McKinley@wizards.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Electronic Notice of Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: McKinley, Shelley <Shelley.McKinley@wizards.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Wednesday, January 26, 2005, 8:01:56 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Electronic Notice of Infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============
To Whom it May Concern,
Wizards of the Coast is the a game manufacturer.  It has recently come to
our attention that the website hosted by your service located at
http://img166.exs.cx/img166/3082/endbringer7lj.jpg is distributing images
from a game in development by Wizards of the Coast (the "Property").
DMCA NOTICE:  Wizards is the exclusive owner of all relevant rights in and
to the Property.  Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"),
we have good faith belief that the images identified above infringe Wizards'
copyrights and other intellectual property rights, and are not authorized by
Wizards or its agents.  I am authorized to act on Wizards' behalf regarding
these matters.  The information provided in this communication is accurate
to the best of my knowledge and is provided under penalty of perjury.

Please act expeditiously to disenable the infringing website as directed by
the DMCA

If you have any questions on the above, please contact me.

Regards,
Shelley McKinley
Corporate Counsel
Wizards of the Coast, Inc.
1801 Lind Ave. SW
Renton, WA 98055
(T) 425.254.2951
(F) 425.204.7689
shelley.mckinley@wizards.com



===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB+QmdvK/XpJs6oyURAg7dAJ9OcmCUe0rm9SMheAgv0JrBUX4VYwCeNCub
m5Hqp9as9xBigoug1K/9ojM=
=B0hT
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
